KitKat::

SHe looked at Kup and let her memory chip remind her where she had 
met this bot before. He knew her but she couldn't remember why. Yet 
he seemed familiar to her somehow. "Listen, first off, I wasn't in 
your territory. Second, maximals and preds would never have an 
allience. Third, if you do have such an allience, then you'd release 
me instead of just thinking about lettimg me go. And another thing..."
She transformed into bot mode. Her sleek and matt black finish was 
flawless. Her form was near perfect. Her wolf tail was still behind 
her, swishing and wagging as she stood up with her elegent hands on 
her well formed hips. She looked at Kup, "And another thing, why save 
me if I'm a pred and your a maximal? Even if we have an allience, we 
are still and will always be eternal enemies. So fixing me up does't 
make sence."  She thought about it some more. "Unless we have a 
common enemy that is so great we need every bot we have."
